phase3.thread.AsyncTask



class AsyncTask(T);
Interface for a large task to be run in the background. It displays a ProgressDialog and should update the progress regularly.

Authors:
Zachery Burris (zburris@uncc.edu) and Richard Voelker (rvoelker@uncc.edu)

Date:
April 21, 2014

this(Display display, Shell mainShell, bool showProgress);
Creates a new AsyncTask and starts running the task.

Params:
Display display The main Display of the application.
Shell mainShell The Shell to parent the ProgressDialog to.
bool showProgress Whether or not to show the Progress Dialog.

Date:
April 21, 2014

void setTaskFinishListener(TaskFinishListener!T taskFinishListener);
Sets the TaskFinishListener to be called when the task finishes.

Params:
TaskFinishListener!T taskFinishListener The TaskFinishListener.

Date:
April 22, 2014
